name: Reset User Password
description: Reset a user's password. You will need UserAuthenticationMethod.ReadWrite.All deleguated permission. And to disable the MFA authentication in your azure AD

id.title: Id
id.description: ID of the user. id or userPrincipalName should be specified.

userPrincipalName.title: Userprincipalname
userPrincipalName.description: Principal Name of the user. id or userPrincipalName should be specified.

userNewPassword.title: Usernewpassword
userNewPassword.description: New password, required to reset the old one of course.
